question: Which state has won the Senior Women's National Football Championship 2018?
explanation: Tamil Nadu has lifted their maiden title in the 23rd edition of the Senior Women\'s National Football Championship 2018 by defeating Manipur in the final by 2-1 at the Barabati Stadium in Cuttack on February 14. Indumathi has also adjudged the player of the final as well as the tournament for her superlative performances.
